query: We need a 7-day travel plan for a group of 4, taking off from Santa Ana and visiting 3 different cities in Texas from March 25th to March 31st, 2022. Our budget is set at $5,800 for the trip. Additionally, our lodging options must accommodate children under the age of 10.
